mapper.select: SELECT wll.* FROM wl_logistics_line wll LEFT JOIN wl_starting_point_ref wspr on wspr.logistics_line_id = wll.id WHERE wspr.warehouse_id = #{warehouseId}
SELECT ww.* FROM wl_warehouse ww LEFT JOIN wl_starting_point_ref wspr on wspr.warehouse_id = ww.id WHERE wspr.logistics_line_id = #{logisticsLineId}
